title: Jandy JXi Rev H+ Heater — Guided Troubleshooting

s1.text: Which input voltage is the JXi configured for?

s1a.text: Measure power at Distribution Board between Black (C) and Red (B). Expected: 110–126 VAC.

s1b.text: Measure power at Distribution Board between Blue (F) and White (D). Expected: 220–252 VAC.

correct_power.text: Correct filter pump wiring/power. Then retest.

transformer.text: Measure Transformer: 24 VAC between Red (2) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

fuse.text: Measure Fuse: 24 VAC at Red (2) & Yellow (1) on PIB. Expected: 22–26 VAC.

replace_fuse.text: Locate/repair short circuit and replace fuse.

pressure_switch.text: Check Water Pressure Switch: 24 VAC between Purple (4) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

replace_pressure_switch.text: If pressure > 2 PSI, replace Pressure Switch; else fix filter/flow issue.

high_limit.text: Check High Limits: 24 VAC between Black (8) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

replace_high_limit.text: Replace High Limits and recheck system.

ignition_control.text: Measure Power to Ignition Control: 24 VAC between Black/Yellow (10) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

check_blower.text: Check blower wiring, relay, or replace blower motor.

air_pressure_switch.text: Check Air Pressure Switch: 24 VAC between Orange (12) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

replace_air_pressure_switch.text: Check blower tubing, seals, or replace Air Pressure Switch if needed.

ignitor_glow.text: After blower runs ~15s, does the Hot Surface Igniter glow?

check_ignitor.text: Measure igniter resistance (40–75 Ω). Replace igniter if open or out of spec.

burners.text: After ignitor glows, do burners ignite?

flame_rectification.text: Heater not recognizing flame (rectification). Check gas pressure, ground, sensor cleanliness, ignitor, wiring, etc.
